snippet: This traveling exhibition, which opens Jan. 24 in Los Angeles, seeks to raise awareness of a little-known art.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Enamel Arts Foundation, which is organizing exhibit Little Dreams in Glass and Metal: Enameling in America, 1920 to the Present, is among handful of collectors, dealers and organizations focusing on enameled objects; Parisian artist Alix Ayme is subject of revived interest, including books, shows and documentary film.
lead_paragraph: This traveling exhibition, which opens Jan. 24 in Los Angeles, seeks to raise awareness of a little-known art.

headline.print_headline: Raising the Profile of the Enamel Arts
headline.main: ‘Little Dreams in Glass and Metal’ Spotlights Enameling
